name: AWS Lambda
description: The Sumo Logic AWS Lambda App uses the Lambda logs via CloudWatch, CloudWatch Metrics and the CloudTrail Lambda Data Events to visualize the operational and performance trends in all the Lambda functions in your account. The preconfigured dashboards provide insights into executions such as memory and duration usage by function versions or aliases, errors, billed duration, function callers, IAM users, and threat details.

queries.queryString:
$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" "IAMUser" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke" and caller_type = "IAMUser"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as InvokeFrequency by caller
| top 10 caller by InvokeFrequency

panels.title: Invocation Comparison - Today vs Yesterday vs Last Week

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Invocations statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | sum by entity
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Invocations statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | sum by entity | timeshift -1d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Invocations statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | sum by entity | timeshift -7d

panels.title: Errors Comparison - Today vs Yesterday vs Last Week

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Errors statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | sum by entity
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Errors statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | sum by entity | timeshift 1d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Errors statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | sum by entity | timeshift 7d

panels.title: Duration Comparison - Today vs Yesterday vs Last Week

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Duration statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg by statistic
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Duration statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg by statistic | timeshift 1d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Duration statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg by entity | timeshift 7d

panels.title: Throttling Comparison - Today vs Yesterday vs Last Week

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Throttles statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg by statistic
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Throttles statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg by statistic | timeshift 1d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Throttles statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg by entity | timeshift 7d

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| sum(Duration) as DurationSum, avg(Duration) as DurationAvg, count as frequency by functionname
| top 10 functionname by DurationAvg, DurationSum, frequency

panels.title: Log - Top Functions by Memory Used

queries.queryString:
$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| max(MaxMemoryUsed) as MaxMemoryUsed by functionname
| top 10 functionname by MaxMemoryUsed, functionname asc

$$logsrccw (errorMessage or ERROR or CRITICAL) account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate, version, logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| parse field=message "*\t*\t*" as time,RequestId,errorObj nodrop | json field=errorObj "errorMessage" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^(?<time>\d+\/\d+\/\d+\s+\d+:\d+:\d+):(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL):(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorMessage), errorMsg, errorMessage) as errorMessage
| where !isEmpty(errorMessage) and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as eventCount

panels.title: Log - Allocated Memory vs Memory Used

queries.queryString:
$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| avg(MemorySize) as MemorySizeAvg, avg(MaxMemoryUsed) as MaxMemoryUsedAvg by functionname
| (MemorySizeAvg - MaxMemoryUsedAvg) as RemainingMemory
| RemainingMemory/MemorySizeAvg as wastageRatio
| top 5 functionname by wastageRatio, RemainingMemory, MaxMemoryUsedAvg
| fields -wastageRatio

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" "AWSService" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke" and caller_type = "AWSService"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as InvokeFrequency by caller
| top 10 caller by InvokeFrequency

$$logsrccw errorMessage account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate, version, logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| parse field=message "*\t*\t*" as time,RequestId,errorObj
| json  field=errorObj "errorMessage"
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as frequency by errorMessage, functionname 
| top 10 errorMessage, functionname by frequency desc, errorMessage asc, functionname asc
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Invocations statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | sum by entity
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=ProvisionedConcurrencyInvocations statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | sum by entity

panels.title: Provisioned Concurrent Executions

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=ProvisionedConcurrentExecutions statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg by entity

panels.description: The number of events that are being processed on provisioned concurrency. For each invocation of an alias or version with provisioned concurrency, Lambda emits the current count.

panels.title: Provisioned Concurrency Utilization

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=ProvisionedConcurrencyUtilization statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg by entity

panels.description: The number of events that are being processed on provisioned concurrency, divided by the total amount of provisioned concurrency allocated. For example, .5 indicates that 50 percent of allocated provisioned concurrency is in use. For each invocation of an alias or version with provisioned concurrency, Lambda emits the current count.

panels.title: Provisioned Concurrency Spillover Invocations

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=ProvisionedConcurrencySpilloverInvocations statistic=Maximum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | max by entity

panels.description: The number of invocations that are run on nonprovisioned concurrency, when all provisioned concurrency is in use. For a version or alias that is configured to use provisioned concurrency, Lambda increments the count once for each invocation that runs on non-provisioned concurrency.

queries.queryString:
$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| where event_name = "Invoke" and Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = src_ip
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, event_name
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Invocations statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | topk(10, max)
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Invocations statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as events by src_ip
| top 10 src_ip by events, src_ip asc

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count by functionname
| top 10 functionname by _count, functionname asc

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as InvokeFrequency by function_version
| top 10 function_version by InvokeFrequency, function_version asc

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" ("Invoke" OR "AssumedRole") account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name in ("Invoke", "AssumedRole")
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| timeslice 5m
| count as InvokeFrequency by function_version, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column function_version 
| fillmissing timeslice (5m)

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as activities by caller_type
| top 10 caller_type by activities, caller_type asc

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as activities by caller
| top 10 caller by activities, caller asc

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname 
| count as frequency by functionname, version, requestID
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| sort by functionname asc
| limit 10

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as frequency by functionname, function_version, caller, caller_type, src_ip, Region
| sort by frequency, functionname, function_version, caller, caller_type, src_ip, Region
| limit 30 | fields -frequency

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate, version, logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname 
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as frequency by functionname
| top 10 functionname by frequency, functionname asc

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" nodrop
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate, version, logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname 
| parse field=message "*\t*\t*" as time,RequestId,messageobj
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| if (messageobj matches "*error*", 1, 0) as haserror
| if (messageobj matches "*error*", 0, 1) as noerror
| sum(haserror) as failrequests, sum(noerror) as passrequests by functionname
| top 10 functionname by failrequests, passrequests

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname 
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count by functionname, version
| transpose row functionname column version

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate, version, logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as events by version
| sort by events, version asc

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| where event_name = "Invoke" and Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| lookup latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code from geo://location on ip = src_ip
| count by latitude, longitude, country_code, country_name, region, city, postal_code, event_name

panels.title: Threat Table based on Caller IP Address

queries.queryString:
$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| where event_name = "Invoke" and Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| count by src_ip,  functionName, caller, user_agent
| lookup type, actor, raw, threatlevel as malicious_confidence from sumo://threat/cs on threat=src_ip 
| json field=raw "labels[*].name" as label_name 
| replace(label_name, "\\/","->") as label_name
| replace(label_name, "\""," ") as label_name
| where  type="ip_address" and malicious_confidence = "high"
| if (isEmpty(actor), "Unassigned", actor) as Actor
| sort by _count
| fields src_ip,  functionName, caller, user_agent, type, actor, malicious_confidence

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" "IAMUser" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke" and caller_type = "IAMUser"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| timeslice 5m
| count by caller, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column caller 
| fillmissing timeslice (5m)

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" "IAMUser" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke" and caller_type = "IAMUser"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as Frequency by caller
| top 10 caller by Frequency

panels.title: Time Compare - IAM User Invoking Functions

queries.queryString:
$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" "IAMUser" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke" and caller_type = "IAMUser"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as today by caller 
| compare with timeshift 1d as yesterday
| sort by today
| today_yesterday as yesterday
| fields -today_yesterday

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" "AWSService" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke" and caller_type = "AWSService"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| timeslice 5m
| count by caller, _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column caller
| fillmissing timeslice (5m)

panels.title: Time Compare - AWS Services Invoking Functions

queries.queryString:
$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" "AWSService" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke" and caller_type = "AWSService"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as today by caller

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" "AWSService" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke" and caller_type = "AWSService"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as Frequency by caller
| top 10 caller by Frequency

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as Frequency by user_agent
| top 10 user_agent by Frequency, user_agent asc

$$logsrcct "lambda.amazonaws.com" "Invoke" account={{account}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "eventName", "eventSource", "awsRegion", "userAgent", "sourceIPAddress", "recipientAccountId", "userIdentity", "requestParameters", "additionalEventData" as event_name, event_source, Region, user_agent, src_ip, accountId, userIdentity, requestParameters, additionalEventData nodrop
| json field=userIdentity "type", "userName", "invokedBy" as caller_type, user_name, invoked_by nodrop | json field=requestParameters "functionName" as func_name nodrop | json field=additionalEventData "functionVersion" as func_version nodrop 
| where user_agent = "lambda.amazonaws.com" and event_name = "Invoke"
| parse regex field=func_name "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<functionname>[\S]+)$"
| parse regex field=func_version "\w+:\w+:\S+:[\w-]+:\S+:\S+:(?<function_version>[\S]+:[\S ]+)$"
| if (isNull(user_name), invoked_by, user_name) as caller
| if (isNull(invoked_by), user_name, invoked_by) as caller
| where Region matches "{{region}}" and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as today by user_agent
| compare with timeshift 1d as yesterday
| sort by today
| today_yesterday as yesterday
| fields -today_yesterday

$$logsrccw (errorMessage or ERROR or CRITICAL) account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate, version, logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname 
| parse field=message "*\t*\t*" as time,RequestId,errorObj nodrop | json field=errorObj "errorMessage" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^(?<time>\d+\/\d+\/\d+\s+\d+:\d+:\d+):(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL):(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorMessage), errorMsg, errorMessage) as errorMessage
| where !isEmpty(errorMessage) and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as eventCount

$$logsrccw (errorMessage or ERROR or CRITICAL) account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| parse field=message "*\t*\t*" as time,RequestId,errorObj nodrop | json field=errorObj "errorMessage" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^(?<time>\d+\/\d+\/\d+\s+\d+:\d+:\d+):(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL):(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorMessage), errorMsg, errorMessage) as errorMessage
| where !isEmpty(errorMessage) and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count by functionname
| sort by _count, functionname asc

$$logsrccw errorMessage (errorMessage or ERROR or CRITICAL) account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| parse field=message "*\t*\t*" as time,RequestId,errorObj nodrop | json field=errorObj "errorMessage" nodrop
| parse regex field=message "^(?<time>\d+\/\d+\/\d+\s+\d+:\d+:\d+):(?<logLevel>ERROR|CRITICAL):(?<errorMsg>.*)" nodrop
| if (isEmpty(errorMessage), errorMsg, errorMessage) as errorMessage
| where !isEmpty(errorMessage) and tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as Frequency by errorMessage, functionname 
| top 10 errorMessage, functionname by Frequency desc, errorMessage asc, functionname asc
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Errors Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | topk(10, max)
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Errors Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=IteratorAge Statistic=Maximum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | topk(10, max)
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=IteratorAge Statistic=Maximum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Throttles Statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | topk(10, max)
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Throttles Statistic=average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=*  | avg

panels.title: Dead Letter Errors by Functions - Trend

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=DeadLetterErrors Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | topk(10, max)
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=DeadLetterErrors Statistic=Sum account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| timeslice 5m
| sum(Duration) as Duration by functionname, _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column functionname

panels.title: Max Memory Used by Function - Timeline

queries.queryString:
$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| timeslice 5m
| sum(MaxMemoryUsed) as MaxMemoryUsedSum by functionname, _timeslice
| sort by _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column functionname

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| sum(Duration) by functionname
| sort by _sum desc

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| count as Frequency by functionname, RequestId, Duration, BilledDuration, MemorySize, MaxMemoryUsed, _messagetime 
| sort by _messagetime 
| formatDate(_messagetime, "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss Z") as time
| fields -Frequency
| fields -_messagetime
| limit 20

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate, version, logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| sum(MaxMemoryUsed) by functionname
| sort by _sum desc

panels.title: Average Duration vs Average Billed Unused Duration

queries.queryString:
$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| avg(BilledDuration) as BilledDurationAvg, avg(Duration) as DurationAvg by functionname
| BilledDurationAvg-DurationAvg as BilledUnusedDuration
| BilledUnusedDuration/BilledDurationAvg as wastageRatio
| top 5 functionname by wastageRatio, BilledUnusedDuration, DurationAvg
| fields -wastageRatio

panels.title: Avg Unused Allocated Memory vs Avg Used Memory

queries.queryString:
$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| avg(MemorySize) as MemorySizeAvg, avg(MaxMemoryUsed) as MaxMemoryUsedAvg by functionname
| (MemorySizeAvg-MaxMemoryUsedAvg) as AvgUnusedAllocatedMemory
| AvgUnusedAllocatedMemory/MemorySizeAvg as wastageRatio
| top 5 functionname by wastageRatio, AvgUnusedAllocatedMemory, MaxMemoryUsedAvg
| fields -wastageRatio

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
// AWS Billing Calculation
| BilledDuration/1000 as BillDurationSeconds
| MemorySize/1024 as MemorySizeGB
| BillDurationSeconds * MemorySizeGB as ComputeUsage
| sum(ComputeUsage) by functionname
| sort by _sum desc

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionname
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| timeslice 5m
// AWS Billing Calculation
| BilledDuration/1000 as BillDurationSeconds
| MemorySize/1024 as MemorySizeGB
| BillDurationSeconds * MemorySizeGB as ComputeUsage
| sum(ComputeUsage) as ComputeUsage by functionname, _timeslice
// | sort by _timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column functionname
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Duration Statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | topk(10, max)
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=Duration Statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | avg

panels.title: Important Points
panels.text:
Concurrent Executions: This shows you the concurrent executions at an account level, and for any function with a custom concurrency limit. Both graphs will be same if none of the functions are configured with concurrency limit. Not applicable for versions or aliases.

UnreservedConcurrentExecutions: This shows you the total concurrent executions for functions assigned to the default unreserved concurrency pool. Not applicable for functions, versions, or aliases.

Invocations vs Errors vs Throttle: It's important to distinguish between an invocation request and an actual invocation. It is possible for the error rate to exceed the number of billed Lambda function invocations. Lambda reports an invocation metric only if the Lambda function code is executed. If the invocation request yields a throttling or other initialization error that prevents the Lambda function code from being invoked, Lambda will report an error, but it does not log an invocation metric.

panels.title: Unreserved Concurrent Executions Comparison - Today vs Yesterday vs Last Week

queries.queryString: Namespace={{namespace}} metric=UnreservedConcurrentExecutions Statistic=Average region={{region}} | topk(10, max)
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=UnreservedConcurrentExecutions Statistic=Average region={{region}} | topk(10, max) | timeshift -1d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=UnreservedConcurrentExecutions Statistic=Average region={{region}} | topk(10, max) | timeshift -7d
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=ConcurrentExecutions Statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* | topk(10, max)
Namespace={{namespace}} metric=ConcurrentExecutions Statistic=Average account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} Resource=* |  sum by region

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionName
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| timeslice 5m
| sum(MemorySize) as MemorySize, sum(MaxMemoryUsed) as MaxMemoryUsed by _timeslice
| MemorySize - MaxMemoryUsed as UnusedMemory
| predict UnusedMemory by 5m model=ar, forecast=12

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionName
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| timeslice 5m
| sum(MaxMemoryUsed) as MaxMemoryUsed by _timeslice
| predict MaxMemoryUsed by 5m model=ar, forecast=12

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionName
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| timeslice 5m
// AWS Billing Calculation
| BilledDuration/1000 as BillDurationSeconds
| MemorySize/1024 as MemorySizeGB
| BillDurationSeconds * MemorySizeGB as ComputeUsage
| sum(ComputeUsage) as ComputeUsage by _timeslice
| predict ComputeUsage by 5m model=ar, forecast=12

$$logsrccw account={{account}} region={{region}} Namespace={{namespace}}
| json "message"
| json "logStream", "logGroup"
// | _sourceName as logStream | _sourceHost as logGroup
| parse regex field=message "REPORT\s+RequestId:\s+(?<RequestId>[^\s]+)\s+Duration:\s+(?<Duration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Billed Duration:\s+(?<BilledDuration>[^\s]+)\s+ms\s+Memory\s+Size:\s+(?<MemorySize>[^\s]+)\s+MB\s+Max\s+Memory\s+Used:\s+(?<MaxMemoryUsed>[^\s]+)\s+MB" 
| parse field=logstream "*/[*]*" as logstreamDate,version,logstreamID
| parse field=loggroup "/aws/lambda/*" as functionName
| where tolowercase(functionname) matches "{{entity}}"
| timeslice 5m
| sum(BilledDuration) as BilledDuration by _timeslice
| predict BilledDuration by 5m model=ar, forecast=12
